text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer How about STARTING by making all COVID-19 testing FREE for Americans, and AVAILABLE ON DEMAND, instead of making them impossible to get, even if you're paying, because Trump doesn't want the real number of infections in the US out there to show what a BAD JOB he's doing. #COVID19
